entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 35 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 41 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then clearing. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
